networking.types

Class MessageWrapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • networking.types.Wrapper
      • networking.types.MessageWrapper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class MessageWrapper
extends Wrapper
implements java.io.Serializable
    Used to hold a message between two clients.
    Contains message, source, destination,
    whether the message has been received by the server or not,
    whether the message has been read by the other client and the message id
    Author:
    Bussard30
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
